title: LG 235 L Direct Cool Single Door 4 Star Refrigerator with Base Drawer  (Blue Charm, GL-D241ABCY)

product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Refrigrator Unit and 10 Years on Compressor
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship

product_description.Smart Inverter Compressor: This refrigerator is equipped with a smart inverter compressor so that you can enjoy efficient performance, silent functioning, stabiliser-free operation, and greater savings.
product_description.Smart Connect: Thanks to the smart connect technology, you can connect your refrigerator to the home inverter so that you can enjoy uninterrupted use during power cuts. This helps prevent your stored food from spoiling.

Within a day after receiving a product I want to return this product and buy another product but Flipkart not ready to arrange the return/refund/exchange with another model. The Product is very fragile & shaky. the water keeps leaking from an unknown place. If all shelf are used the Airflow will not reach till the bottom shelf. The water drip tray is at the backside this is risky to reach due to nearby open electrical components. and most importantly for such quality once should not spend more than 10,000. I request Flipkart / LG to allow me to buy different model, I can pay the difference in the amount. But cannot use this unit forcefully & unwilling. my whole family is dissatisfied after buying this product from Flipkart.

looks is very good.Talking one by one.
Compressor : Smart invertor compressor runs all the time as compared to reciprocatory compressor but it does not make noise.The operation is silent.Only when you put stuff inside the fridge little gas operation humming sound will come. once the fridge is cooled properly the sound goes off( humming sound is negligible)
Looks : Awesome looks
Built : Solid built but i felt the fridge is little light.
Performance : Good also ice making process is fast.
Transport : Delivery guy makes false comments that someone will come for installation. It is plug and use.
Space : width is more compared to other 200 liter model fridge. Good for 2-3 people.
Do not remove the round coil behind the fridge it is used for insulation but even if removed it does not impact the performance of the product.
Overall classy product.
